member.summary: Shared cache.

member.name: M:Avalonia.Skia.SKCacheBase`2.Get
member.summary: Gets a cached item for usage.
member.remarks: If there is a available item in the cache, the cached item will be returned.. Otherwise a new cached item will be created.

member.name: M:Avalonia.Skia.SKCacheBase`2.Return(`0)
member.summary: Returns the item for reuse later.
member.remarks: Do not use the item further. Do not return the same item multiple times as that will break the cache.

member.name: M:Avalonia.Skia.SKCacheBase`2.Clear
member.summary: Clears and disposes all cached items.

member.summary: Cache for SKPaints.

member.name: M:Avalonia.Skia.SKPaintCache.ReturnReset(SkiaSharp.SKPaint)
member.summary: Returns a SKPaint and resets it for reuse later.
member.remarks: Do not use the paint further. Do not return the same paint multiple times as that will break the cache. Uses SKPaint.Reset() for reuse later.

member.summary: Cache for SKRoundRectCache.

member.summary: Cache for points to use for setting the radii.

member.summary: Gets a cached SKRoundRect and sets it with the passed rectangle and Radii.

Rounded rectangle to copy the radii from.

member.summary: Gets a cached SKRoundRect and sets it with the passed rectangle and Radii.
member.param: Rectangle size to set the cached rectangle to.

member.name: M:Avalonia.Skia.SKRoundRectCache.ReturnReset(SkiaSharp.SKRoundRect)
member.summary: Returns a SKPaint and resets it for reuse later.
member.remarks: Do not use the rect further. Do not return the same rect multiple times as that will break the cache. Uses SKRoundRect.SetEmpty(); for reuse later.

member.summary: Clears and disposes all cached items.

member.name: P:Avalonia.SkiaOptions.MaxGpuResourceSizeBytes
